SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class BenchmarkingUtility

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.BenchmarkingUtility
public class BenchmarkingUtility extends Object
This class provides helper methods for facilitating statistical analysis of time measurements and launching/managing benchmarking tasks.

    • calculateConfidenceInterval

      public static double[] calculateConfidenceInterval(List<Long> times, double confidenceLevel)
      Calculates the confidence interval for the mean of the given times.
      Parameters:
      times - The list of times.
      confidenceLevel - The confidence level (e.g., 0.95 for 95% confidence).
      Returns:
      An array containing the lower and upper bounds of the confidence interval.
